Name: Double Grape Martini
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered green grapes..
MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker.
Review: White wine acidity adds complexity to this simple grape cocktail. The name represents the combination of grapes and wine made from grapes.
History: Created in 2004 by yours truly, London, England.
